channel.title: 2 questions from cheezscape (about dialogue and item on npc)
channel.description:
What do i do to make, say: uncut ruby on an npc, then make im send "dialogue"?
(pretty much 2 questions in 1)[br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2007, 07:34:16 PM[/size][hr]sorry, i meant "make them send dialogue"
